::KitKat::

She looked at Phobia with a shocked expression on her face.  "YOu 
think I can lead a group of warriors on a mission? Oh I thank you for 
the flattery But Megatron would have my hide tacked on the wall or 
use it as a throw rug.  Oh no. too many here who follow Megatron. I 
admit,I'm upset over this last campain that we lost. But who expects 
a leader to win every battle all the time." She did crack a smile,
"But you realy do think I could lead a successful group huh?"
The idea made her laugh. "No, no bot in there right mind would folow 
me.  For one, I don't instill fear. I draw respect, not fear.  
Second, I have neither the experience or skill that megatron has for 
battle stratagy.  I'm an excelent soldier, but a commander." She 
smiled again, "Well, not yet."
She felt a little giddy at the thought of her being a leader. She had 
never really thought about it, but it was a fun day dream.

to

lead

two. "Then 
> she or whomever the case was would get the prestige, the publicity,

common 
> foe."
> 
> If his words didn't convince her he'd have to result to the facts 
he
